title: Share of girls of primary school age achieving minimum proficiency in mathematics
subtitle: The share of children who achieve minimum [math](#dod:math-proficiency) proficiency by the end of [primary](#dod:primary-education) education, where students can demonstrate skills in number sense and computation, basic measurement, reading, interpreting, and constructing graphs, spatial orientation, and number patterns. This data accounts for school completion rates to estimate skills for all children, not just those in school.
